author: Giovani Antonio
comment: It used to be my favorite sport app but it's not anymore cause the "alert" option isn't available anymore so bad cause while working I didn't miss any score cause this app used to update me every minute. If you guys could fix that I would consider to rate it 5 stars. Meanwhile I am using another one (all football) which notifies me live scores. Thanks keep up the great work!

reply.author: BeSoccer Apps
reply.content: Hello Giovani, we'd appreciate it if you got in contact with us via soporte@besoccer.com with any problems that you might have. Thanks for your help. Regards! BeSoccer Team

author: David Lee
comment: It's pretty good. It has a lot of competitions and leagues available to be viewed. The only thing I'd like to request is the news being shown chronologically instead of the top news being on top. The "latest" section is not in chronological order too.

reply.author: BeSoccer Apps
reply.content: Thanks David, we appreciate your comment and we have taken your suggestion into account. Regards! BeSoccer Team

author: raj bodat
comment: Rated it one star and uninstalled immediately just because it has a  abusive advertisement which needs to be fixed ASAP. Without a doubt it gives update on point. But "hypstar" app Ad is bothering and INTOLERABLE. Highly abusive content. Please look into the matter.

reply.author: BeSoccer Apps
reply.content: Hi Raj, you have the possibility to remove the ads in exchange for a small subscription. You can do this in the Remove ads section of the side menu. Thanks for comment. Regards! BeSoccer Team

author: Sakyi jnr Sakyi jnr
comment: The live telecast is working no more. It makes me kind of hate this app now.

reply.author: BeSoccer Apps
reply.content:
We're working on it, it's an external service to our company and we're trying to see what we can do to keep it going. Sorry for the inconvenience.

A greeting!
BeSoccer Team.
